welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sanderstead, United Kingdom! Known for its charming atmosphere and picturesque landscapes, we invite you to explore and discover all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport offers a range of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to VIP and private jet passengers, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport is a modern and compact building, providing easy access to all facilities.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at London City Airport offers VIP services and exclusive lounges for private jet passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the airport's newest terminal, opened in 1988. It is home to many international airlines and offers a variety of shopping and dining options.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the airport's original terminal, opened in 1958. It is home to many low-cost airlines and offers a variety of shopping and dining options.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster speeds and unlimited usage.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: One of the oldest terminals at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Oneworld airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A medium-sized terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly SkyTeam airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The newest and most modern terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly British Airways and Iberia.

wifi.note: Free for 45 minutes, then available for a fee.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport handles all incoming and outgoing flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rochester Airport is used for transporting goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport offers a modern and luxurious experience for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: For those flying on private jets, the private terminal at Farnborough Airport offers exclusive services and amenities.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
